games.name: Custom Minigames
games.creator: Customs Community
games.description: A fun little cozy game to pass the time, collect stuff, meet new people, compete in chill leaderboards, and hangout. Basically a barebones alternative to Epic Minigames.

games.name: Pax Americana
games.creator: xLawOut
games.description: Very fun game with lots of things to do, super heated and very active factions gameplay, tight-knit community, and 2017-era gameplay style with robust mechanics and weapons. It is a bit toxic and polarized, but the moderators are mature and the owner is present. Great alternative to The Wild West.

games.name: Bulwark
games.creator: ChiaPetDie
games.description: Highly realistic R6 game having solid, satisfactory, and historically acurrate mechanics, with rich gameplay styles and character custumization. Bulwark has a lot of weapons to choose from, and mechanics like parrying, feinting, and deflecting. Solid game with a nice lore, medieval fun, and a gorgeous map.

games.name: Nullxiety
games.creator: Nullxiety
games.description: A horror-like game where you and up to 100 other people (generally its just you as the game is a bit dead) participate in various challenges so that "Null" can discover who is the strongest player. Has some nice amount of lore, but it is a hard game and it needs a lot of thinking.

games.name: DOOMED
games.creator: LuaShoe
games.description: An open world fighting game, where you can play as about 22 different creatures and monsters ranging from oversized moths made out of cloth, three-legged mammals made out of sand, giant rock titans that came straight from ancient Old World mythology, to even sentient naturally-exploding bio-mechanic animals, all with different abilities. One of the best games of all Roblox, and it has a mildly active community.
games.otherversion: Classic, it is the most active version, and its popular among veteran players and the older community because of the lack of melee in many creatures and the preservation of some old movesets.

games.name: Somewhere Nowhere
games.creator: Roytt
games.description: Masterpiece made in 2010 that makes you think about life and contemplation. It has no chat, it has no UI, it has no objectives, it is just you, somewhere nowhere, and the music. A captivating work of art that always calms me down in times of stress and anxiety. This is the uttermost serenity you will find in Roblox, and I highly recommend everyone visiting this paradise at least once their lives.

games.name: SUNDOWNER
games.creator: Newberiance & Xetheriance
games.description: An unforgiving psychological experience, where your goal is to scavenge for scarce food in an uncanny, god-forsaken desert, struggling to survive not only because of hunger, but because of the constant reminder of all kinds of terrific deaths. Solid and melancholic game with unique visuals, a heavy lore, and multiple different endings.

games.name: Tripod Invasion
games.creator: ChelGames Development
games.description: A well made horror-like where you can either play as a hopeless human praying to not get crushed like a pathethic bug, or as a gargantuan alien-like mechanical tripod that shoots lasers out of its hands. It is somewhat incomplete and experimental, but it is still worth to check out because the tripod model is well made and its movement mechanics too.

games.name: Critical Strike
games.creator: Critical Studio
games.description: A classic battlegrounds game from 2013 that gives you the option to choose from hundreds of different classes with unique abilities and fight with players in various maps. Now revived, Critical Strike is a very fun game to play, try new classes, different strategies, grind, and pass the time, whether you are a new or an experienced player.
games.otherversion: Original, it is abandoned and inactive by the original developers (the owner got hacked).

games.name: The Troubles
games.creator: The Troubl–µs Community
games.description: A fun and mostly acurrate historical game that depicts the Troubles as a FPS. You can play in various maps and two gamemodes, either as the as a member of the IRA or of the British Army, and engage in various types of combat: From large scale battles with helicopters and APCs, to close quarters combat in an urban environment.

games.name: yargh seas
games.creator: Threasto
games.description: A somewhat silly pirate game with a beautiful map and solid mechanics where you can explore islands for treasures, dig for scrap, collect guns, etc. It is a small, cozy, and polished experience that is worth some time.

games.name: The Legend of Calezerb's Sword Classic
games.creator: DrChowderr
games.description: It is the classic version of a very old 2010 RPG, with a nice amount of lore, a typical enjoyable CRPG experience, but a lot of grinding. This game is long dead, partially incomplete, and receives no players, but it is still worth to check out if you have way more than its price and you like classic RPGs.
games.otherversion: Original, it has gone through hundreds of changes and is considerably worse than the classic version.

games.name: Energy Assault
games.creator: Typical Games
games.description: A fun futuristic fast-paced laser FPS with a well established community, active development, and a lot of maps. A bit pay to win, but still, again, fun.

games.name: ROBLOX Library
games.creator: ClanDrone
games.description: A very cozy and welcoming library where you can read player-made books (with a quality filter) about various topics and chill, hangout, and even discover the deep secrets of the dÃ∂ÃöÃÆeÃµÕêÃØlÃ∂ÃÑÃ†pÃ¥ÃÑÕàhÃµÃçÃ†oÃ∑ÃæÕïmÃ∂ÕäÃß Ã∏ÃΩÃócÃµÕíÃ¶aÃ∂ÃæÃ´vÃ∂ÃçÃ±eÃ¥ÃîÕàrÃ∂ÃáÃùnÃ∑ÃêÃ∫sÃ∑ÃÇÕô . Its an old game from 2015 with a semi-dead community that receives dozens of books per year. Currently, it has over 4000 and is actively growing.

games.name: Dream Game
games.creator: VerticalAscent & Contributors
games.description: An exploration adventure game where you wander through different dreams each sleep. It involves platforming, classic combat, cryptic secrets and uncovering a story told by clues, alongside social hangout and sandbox elements.

games.name: Framed!
games.creator: pa00
games.description: A classic, actively updated, action-packed agent FPS from 2010 where you hunt down and kill your target while staying out of sight of the law, earning the respect of the mysterious PHARO corporation by eliminating the other spies and escaping alive.

games.name: Entry Point
games.creator: Cishshato
games.description: A stealth/action FPS where you join a powerful criminal organization and you entera world of high profile operations like taking down banks, targeting multi-millionares and breaking into blacksites. From stealth to explosive playstyles, there are a lot to choose from, and I recommend playing it.
